snippet.title: I Added a Drift Car to My Racing Game (Apex Rush)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Apex Rush on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638250/Apex_Rush/
Today we're checking out some new updates and cars I've added to my racing game Apex Rush! Some of these things made the game 10x better and it's now a lot easier to create unique tracks and do cool stunts! Also with the addition of the new drift car and customization!

Got any ideas you'd like to see me try to add? Let me know in the comments!

Check out 7HC! 
https://www.instagram.com/ein7hc/
Check out Simon's assets here! 
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/SCQDevelopers

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/mCZ59bDsFr

Make sure to Subscribe today to never miss an update of Apex Rush!
